References

   
Module ActorModifierCore
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/ActorModifierCore/Source/ActorModifierCore/Public/Modifiers/ActorModifierCoreStack.h
Include #include "Modifiers/ActorModifierCoreStack.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, BlueprintType, DefaultToInstanced, EditInlineNew)  
class UActorModifierCoreStack : public UActorModifierCoreBase

Remarks

A modifier stack contains modifiers and is also a modifier by itself

void

)

void

Constants

Name Description
OnModifierAddedDelegate Called when a modifier is added to the stack
OnModifierMovedDelegate Called when a modifier is moved in the stack
OnModifierRemovedDelegate Called when a modifier is removed from the stack
OnModifierReplacedDelegate Called when a modifier is replaced in the stack (blueprint)
